title: Design and fabrication of broadband ultralow reflectivity black Si surfaces by laser micro/nanoprocessing
title_cn: 宽带超低反射率黑硅表面的激光微纳加工设计与制作
abstract: Light collection efficiency is an important factor that affects the performance of many optical and optoelectronic devices. In these devices, the high reflectivity of interfaces can hinder efficient light collection. To minimize unwanted reflection, anti-reflection surfaces can be fabricated by micro/nanopatterning. In this paper, we investigate the fabrication of broadband anti-reflection Si surfaces by laser micro/nanoprocessing. Laser direct writing is applied to create microstructures on Si surfaces that reduce light reflection by light trapping. In addition, laser interference lithography and metal assisted chemical etching are adopted to fabricate the Si nanowire arrays. The anti-reflection performance is greatly improved by the high aspect ratio subwavelength structures, which create gradients of refractive index from the ambient air to the substrate. Furthermore, by decoration of the Si nanowires with metallic nanoparticles, surface plasmon resonance can be used to further control the broadband reflections, reducing the reflection to below 1.0% across from 300 to 1200 nm. An average reflection of 0.8% is achieved.
abstract_cn: 集光效率是影响许多光学和光电设备性能的重要因素。在这些设备中，界面的高反射率会阻碍有效的光收集。为了使不希望的反射最小化，可以通过微/纳光法制造抗反射表面。在本文中，我们研究了通过激光微/纳米加工制造宽带减反射硅表面。应用激光直接写入可以在Si表面上创建微结构，从而减少由于光陷阱而引起的光反射。另外，采用激光干涉光刻和金属辅助化学刻蚀来制作硅纳米线阵列。高纵横比的亚波长结构极大地提高了抗反射性能，该结构产生了从周围空气到基板的折射率梯度。此外，通过用金属纳米粒子装饰Si纳米线，可以使用表面等离振子共振来进一步控制宽带反射，从而将反射率从300纳米降低到1.00％至8200 nm。平均反射率为0.8％。

title: Ultrastable embedded surface plasmon confocal interferometry
title_cn: 超稳定嵌入式表面等离子体共聚焦干涉仪
abstract: As disease diagnosis becomes more sophisticated, there is a requirement to measure small numbers of molecules attached to, for instance, an antibody. This requires a sensor capable not only of high sensitivity but also the ability to make measurements over a highly localized region. In previous publications, we have shown how a modified confocal microscope allows one to make localized surface plasmon (SP) measurements on a scale far smaller than the surface plasmon propagation distance. The present implementation presents a new ultrastable interferometer system, which greatly improves the noise performance. Hitherto, we have used the central part of the back focal plane to form a reference beam with the reradiated surface plasmons. In the current system, we block the central part and use the spatial light modulator to deflect s-polarized light into the pinhole to form an interference signal with the surface plasmons, thus creating an ultrastable interferometer formed with two beams incident at very similar angles. We demonstrate the superior noise performance of the system in hostile environments and examine further adaptations of the system to further enhance noise performance.
abstract_cn: 随着疾病诊断变得更加复杂，需要测量附着于例如抗体的少量分子。这需要不仅具有高灵敏度的传感器，而且还需要能够在高度局部区域进行测量的传感器。在以前的出版物中，我们已经展示了一种改进的共聚焦显微镜如何允许人们进行远小于表面等离激元传播距离的规模的局部表面等离激元（SP）测量。本实施方式提出了一种新的超稳定干涉仪系统，该系统大大提高了噪声性能。迄今为止，我们已经使用后焦平面的中心部分与辐射的表面等离子体激元形成参考光束。在当前系统中，我们遮挡中心部分，并使用空间光调制器将s偏振光偏转到针孔中，从而与表面等离子体激元形成干涉信号，从而创建了一个超稳定干涉仪，该干涉仪由两个以非常相似的角度入射的光束形成。我们展示了该系统在恶劣环境中的优越噪声性能，并研究了系统的进一步适应性以进一步增强噪声性能。

title: Simultaneous broadband generation of second and third harmonics from chirped nonlinear photonic crystals
title_cn: chi非线性光子晶体同时宽带产生二次谐波和三次谐波
abstract: Ultrabroadband laser sources are highly desirable in a wide variety of modern science disciplines ranging from physics, chemistry and materials science to information communications and processing. Here we present the design and fabrication of a chirped periodically poled lithium niobate (CPPLN) nonlinear photonic crystal that supports multiple orders of quasiphase matching with finite bandwidth and allows for the simultaneous broadband generation of second and third harmonics with high conversion efficiency. Moreover, the chirp rate has a significant influence on the conversion efficiency and bandwidth. The CPPLN scheme offers a promising approach for the construction of short-wavelength laser sources and enables the generation of the three primary colors—red, green and blue—from a single crystal, which may have potential applications in large-screen laser displays.
abstract_cn: 从物理，化学和材料科学到信息通信和处理，现代激光学科非常需要宽带激光源。 在这里，我们介绍a的周期性极化铌酸锂（CPPLN）非线性光子晶体的设计和制造，该晶体支持具有有限带宽的多个准相位匹配，并能够以高转换效率同时产生第二和三次谐波。 而且，线性调频率对转换效率和带宽有重要影响。 CPPLN方案为构建短波长激光源提供了一种有前途的方法，并能够从单晶生成三种原色（红色，绿色和蓝色），这在大屏幕中可能具有潜在的应用。 激光显示器。

title: Proposed graphene nanospaser
abstract: We propose a novel nanospaser that operates in the mid-infrared region and utilizes a nanopatch of graphene as its plasmonic core and a quantum-well cascade as its gain medium. This design takes advantage of the low optical losses in graphene resulting from its high electron mobility. The proposed quantum cascade graphene spaser generates optical fields with unprecedentedly high nanolocalization, which is characteristic of graphene plasmons. This spaser will be an efficient nanosource of intense and coherent hot-spot fields in the mid-infrared spectral region with potential widespread applications in mid-infrared nanoscopy, nanospectroscopy, nanolithography, and optoelectronic information processing.
abstract_cn: 我们提出了一种在中红外区域工作的新型纳米SPASER，该纳米SPASER以石墨烯的纳米补丁作为其等离子体耦合核心，并利用量子阱级联作为其增益介质。 这种设计利用了石墨烯因其高电子迁移率而产生的低光学损失。 提出的量子级联石墨烯填隙器产生具有前所未有的高纳米定位的光场，这是石墨烯等离子体激元的特征。 这种spaser将是中红外光谱区域内密集且相干热点区域的高效纳米源，在中红外纳米显微镜，纳米光谱，纳米光刻和光电信息处理中具有潜在的广泛应用。
